description: Detects process handle on LSASS process with certain access mask
false_positives: Legitimate software accessing LSASS process for legitimate reason; update the whitelist with it
name: Generic Password Dumper Activity on LSASS
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_data.ObjectName:*\\lsass.exe AND ((winlog.event_id:"4656" AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:(*0x40* OR *0x1400* OR *0x100000* OR *0x1410* OR *0x1010* OR *0x1438* OR *0x143a* OR *0x1418* OR *0x1f0fff* OR *0x1f1fff* OR *0x1f2fff* OR *0x1f3fff*)) OR (winlog.event_id:"4663" AND AccessList:(*4484* OR *4416*)))) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.ProcessName:(*\\wmiprvse.exe OR *\\taskmgr.exe OR *\\procexp64.exe OR *\\procexp.exe OR *\\lsm.exe OR *\\csrss.exe OR *\\wininit.exe OR *\\vmtoolsd.exe OR *\\minionhost.exe OR *\\VsTskMgr.exe OR *\\thor.exe OR *\\thor64.exe OR *\\MicrosoftEdgeUpdate.exe OR *\\GamingServices.exe OR *\\svchost.exe OR *\\MsMpEng.exe OR *\\MRT.exe OR *RtkAudUService64) AND winlog.event_data.ProcessName:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWow64\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysNative\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\asgard2\-agent\\* OR C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\*)) OR (winlog.event_data.ProcessName:C\:\\Program\ Files*) OR (winlog.event_data.ProcessName:"C\:\\Windows\\CCM\\CcmExec.exe"))))
author: Roberto Rodriguez
Teymur Kheirkhabarov
Dimitrios Slamaris
Mark Russinovich
Aleksey Potapov
oscd.community (update)
